an4.129:4.3: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:4.4: Tatra ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:4.5: Atittāva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisā hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati.
an4.129:5.1: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:5.2: Tattha ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:5.3: Atittāva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisā hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati.
an4.129:6.1: Sace, bhikkhave, upāsakaparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:6.2: Tatra ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:6.3: Atittāva, bhikkhave, upāsakaparisā hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati.
an4.129:7.1: Sace, bhikkhave, upāsikāparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:7.2: Tatra ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
an4.129:7.3: Atittāva, bhikkhave, upāsikāparisā hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati.
an4.129:7.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”ti.
